content:
Damian: (nodding slowly) I understand. Thank you, John. I think I'm ready to ask for forgiveness from God now.
Jonathan: (smiling) That's great to hear, Damian. Let's pray together and ask for God's forgiveness and guidance.
(Damian and Jonathan bow their heads and close their eyes)
Jonathan: Dear God, we come before you with humble hearts and confess our sins to you. We ask for your forgiveness and guidance in our lives. We pray for Damian, that he may feel your love and forgiveness and that you may heal his heart. We also pray for ourselves, that we may continue to grow in our faith and live our lives for you. In Jesus' name we pray, amen.
(Damian wipes away tears and smiles)
Damian: (smiling) Thank you, John. I feel like a weight has been lifted off my shoulders.
Jonathan: (smiling) That's great to hear, Damian. Remember, God loves you and He forgives you. And I'm here for you if you ever need someone to talk to.
Damian: (grateful) Thank you, John. I appreciate your support and your faith. I think I'm ready to start living my life for God now.
Jonathan: (smiling) That's wonderful, Damian. I'll be praying for you and cheering you on every step of the way.
